section.title: Evacuate instances
section.para: If a cloud compute node fails due to a hardware malfunction or another reason, you can evacuate instances to make them available again. You can choose evacuation parameters for your use case.
To preserve user data on server disk, you must configure shared storage on the target host. Also, you must validate that the current VM host is down; otherwise, the evacuation fails with an error.
